topic.title: CARE PROFESSIONAL DISCHARGE RESPONSIBILITY INDICATOR (EMERGENCY CARE)
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether a CARE PROFESSIONAL is responsible for discharge of the PATIENT from an Emergency Care Attendance.
